title: Connection problems
text: This concept of wi-fi lighting is great but iSuper doesn't have it together yet. They have better features than Phillips Hue but there's always a connection problem between the smart phone and their switch which is connected to a router. What going on with iSuper's programmers? They need to step and get with it before It's too late and Phillips takes the whole market.

title: Review
text:
I don't understand this pp. with what if I bulb hardware does it connect? 
Nothing happens when downloaded other than saying "connect to your home network" which I m. Useless!

title: Not for LIFX bulbs
text: This may be a fine application, but it came up when i entered the search term lifx.  I don't know who set that as a search term, but it was an irritating waste of time for me.
